option.name: fileSummaryMaps
option.value: {"C:/tombola":"{\"/src/cartellone.java\":\"`cartellone`: A class that represents a cartellone (a type of bingo card) and provides methods to manage the numbers on it.\\n\\n`haNumeri()`: A method that checks if the cartellone has more numbers to be drawn (up to 90).\\n\\n`estraiNumero()`: A method that extracts the next number from the cartellone and increments the internal number counter.\",\"/src/giocatore.java\":\"`giocatore`: A class that represents a player in a game, with a name and a set of game cards.\\n\\n`giocatore(String nome, int nCartelle)`: A constructor that initializes a player with a name and a specified number of game cards.\\n\\n`segnaNumero(int numero)`: A method that marks a number on all of the player\\u0027s game cards.\\n\\n`getNome()`: A method that returns the name of the player.\\n\\n`stampaCartelle()`: A method that prints all of the player\\u0027s game cards.\",\"/src/Main.java\":\"This file appears to be a Java program that simulates a game of Bingo. It allows the user to input the number of players and the number of cards each player has, and then it simulates the game by drawing numbers and updating the players\\u0027 cards. Here\\u0027s a summary of the classes and functions in the file:\\n\\n`Main`: The main class that runs the Bingo game simulation.\\n\\n`giocatore`: A class that represents a player in the Bingo game, with methods to manage their cards and mark numbers.\\n\\n`cartellone`: A class that represents the Bingo board, with methods to draw and manage the numbers.\\n\\n`main(String[] args)`: The main function that prompts the user for input, creates the players and the Bingo board, and runs the game simulation.\",\"/src/cartella.java\":\"This file contains a single class named `cartella` which represents a bingo card. The class has several functions that handle the generation, marking, and checking of the bingo card.\\n\\n`cartella`: A class that represents a bingo card, with methods to generate the card, mark numbers, and check for various bingo patterns.\\n\\n`generaCartella()`: A private method that generates the initial bingo card by filling in the numbers.\\n\\n`controllaRiga(int riga, String nomeGiocatore)`: A private method that checks if a row on the bingo card has a specific number of marked numbers and updates the game status accordingly.\\n\\n`controllaTombola(String nomeGiocatore)`: A private method that checks if the entire bingo card is filled and updates the game status accordingly.\\n\\n`segnaNumero(int numero, String nomeGiocatore)`: A public method that marks a number on the bingo card and checks for any bingo patterns.\\n\\n`stampaCartella()`: A public method that prints the current state of the bingo card.\"}"}
